OOC: Sorry if the hole is a mode, I needed someway for the spark to get out=
!  The first part is sort of an introduction, the part after the line is th=
e first time of me actually using him.  And a big appology for violence aga=
inst rabbits!

    A dim, ex-Alliance spark is buried in a dark, Maximal st=
orage place.  The spark was that of the one and only Skulletron.  It starte=
d to light up a bit.  Then, it started to float.  It flew around a little b=
it, then saw a hole, big enough for it to get outside.  It flew out, and fl=
ew all over.  Then, it disappeared in a small explosion of light.  It was h=
eading towards the Matrix.  Skulletron's spark got closer, and closer.  The=
n, the Matrix spoke.

    "Hideous spark!  I can not take you, Skulletron, =
and I won't.  Now, I must ban you from here, and I shall send you away to t=
he Vok," the Matrix's voice said.

     Skulletron's spark was sent to a Vo=
k colony way out in space.  They took his spark, and began making an organi=
c creature out of him.  They made him a gruesome killing machine.  And they=
 named him Slaughter.  Slaughter still had the mind and memories of Skullet=
ron.  Revenge.  Slaughter had to eat everything he killed, to live.  If he =
didn't eat within 2 days, he would die.  He even ate energon and sparks.  T=
he Vok were satisfied with their creation, and sent him to Earth.  Slaughte=
r appeared in Canada.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
         =
Slaughter was in a dense forest.  He looked around.  A rabbit!  Slaughter r=
an over, then did a somersault and landed in front of the rabbit.  The rabb=
it stared up at him, and vice-versa.  A drop of slime dropped from Slaughte=
r's chin and landed on the rabbit's head, and the rabbit blinked, then trie=
d rubbing the slime off.  Slaughter picked up the rabbit by its neck with h=
is pinsir, then crammed the rabbit into his mouth, and chewed vigorously.  =
The crunching of bones and guts could be heard.  Then, Slaughter was finish=
ed his meal.  Some blood still dripped from the sides of his mouth, but he =
didn't bother to wipe it, and let it drip.  Slaughter flapped his wings and=
 flew up over the trees.  Then, he began flying off, looking for a bigger m=
eal.
